message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it holds significant value, and I'm happy to start the conversation at $20,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  While I see the value you place on it, I'm aiming for a price closer to $18,000.  I believe this reflects the true worth of the product. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $15,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $15,000?
